3 Bedroom House for Sale in Zoo Park

Located in the desirable Zoo Park, this beautifully maintained 3-bedroom home is perfect for families seeking comfort, space, and convenience.

The property features a spacious main bedroom with a private en-suite bathroom, offering a peaceful retreat. The other two bedrooms are generously sized and share a full family bathroom, complete with a shower, bath, toilet, and basin.

For those who enjoy entertaining, this home includes an indoor built-in braai, ideal for gatherings all year round. Step outside to enjoy the swimming pool, a perfect spot for summer relaxation, and a covered lapa, perfect for al fresco dining, hosting guests, or simply unwinding in a tranquil setting. The property also offers a large, well-maintained yard, providing plenty of space for children to play, gardening enthusiasts to indulge, or the possibility of further development.

The tandem garage accommodates up to three cars, providing ample parking and additional storage space for all your needs.

Whether you're looking for a family home with room to grow or a property that balances comfort with entertainment, this house offers it all.

This home is a perfect combination of practical living and leisure. With its prime location, spacious living areas, and outdoor features, it’s the ideal property for families looking for a well-rounded home.

Contact us today to schedule a viewing and explore all that this fantastic property has to offer!
